teal.render.viewer

Interface TViewer3D

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasBoundingArea, HasID, HasPickCanvas, HasUniverse, java.io.Serializable, TViewer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractViewer3D, ViewerJ3D

    public interface TViewer3D
extends TViewer, HasUniverse, HasPickCanvas
    This interface defines all of the required functionality for a 3D viewer.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface teal.render.viewer.TViewer

        ATTACH, EXAMINE, FLY, HOVER, NONE, ORBIT, ORBIT_ALL, RESET_CAMERA, ROTATE, ROTATE_X, ROTATE_Y, ROTATE_Z, TRANSLATE, TRANSLATE_X, TRANSLATE_Y, TRANSLATE_Z, VIEW_STATUS, VP_ROTATE, VP_TRANSLATE, VP_ZOOM, ZOOM
